remarks: Equivalent of Axiom of Choice.  Using the Boundedness Axiom ~ bnd2 , we derive this strong version of ~ ac6 that doesn't require ` B ` to be a set.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2004.)
statement:
ac6s.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ac6s.2 $e |- ( y = ( f ` x ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ac6s $p |- ( A. x e. A E. y e. B ph -> E. f ( f : A --> B /\ A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
$d A f x $.
$d B f x y $.
$d f ph $.
$d ps y $.
